definitions.definition: The simultaneous firing of a number of missiles or bullets ; the projectiles so fired .
A burst or emission of many things at once.
The flight of a ball just before it bounces .
A shot in which the ball is played before it hits the ground .
A sending of the ball full to the top of the wicket .

main_definition: The simultaneous firing of a number of missiles or bullets ; the projectiles so fired .
secondary_definitions: A burst or emission of many things at once.
( sports ) The flight of a ball just before it bounces .
( sports ) A shot in which the ball is played before it hits the ground .
( cricket ) A sending of the ball full to the top of the wicket .
